review_text: I'm absolutely thrilled with my purchase! The book arrived in perfect condition and the shipping was incredibly fast. I'll definitely be buying from this store again. Highly recommend!
Great selection of books and fair prices. My order took a little longer to arrive than expected, but the customer service was very helpful when I reached out. Overall, a positive experience.
I can't believe I wasted my money here. The book was damaged and the cover was torn. I tried to contact them but nobody responded. This is ridiculous. DON'T BUY HERE.
LOL, I ordered a book about time travel and the delivery guy was 10 minutes late. I guess the irony isn't lost on me! Still, great book, I'm loving it. The store is fantastic!
The book was okay. Nothing special. It's a book. It came. End of story.
I found a rare edition I've been searching for everywhere! Thank you so much for having it in stock. You guys are the best book store out there. My new go-to place for all things literary!

Why do you even sell this book? The plot is terrible, the characters are bland, and the ending makes no sense. I regret this purchase. This is a review for the book, not the store, but I'm leaving it here anyway. You should stop selling bad books.
Pretty good store. Good selection, fast shipping, and the book was well-packaged. I'd shop here again. No complaints.
I am so happy with this book! The quality is amazing, the cover art is even better in person, and I can't wait to dive in. It's exactly what I wanted. Thank you for a fantastic service!
The worst. Just the absolute worst. Don't even bother.
